<!-- Year Filter Script -->
<script>
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    const filter = document.getElementById('yearFilter');
    const cards = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.news-card'));

    // Build year buttons (unique, sorted desc)
    const years = [...new Set(cards.map(c => c.dataset.year))].sort((a, b) => b - a);
    const frag = document.createDocumentFragment();
    for (const y of years) {
      const btn = document.createElement('button');
      btn.type = 'button';
      btn.className = 'btn btn-outline-primary';
      btn.dataset.year = y;
      btn.textContent = y;
      frag.appendChild(btn);
    }
    filter.appendChild(frag);

    // Delegate clicks to filter buttons
    filter.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
      const btn = e.target.closest('button[data-year]');
      if (!btn) return;
      const y = btn.dataset.year;

      // Toggle active state
      filter.querySelectorAll('button').forEach(b => b.classList.toggle('active', b === btn));

      // Show/Hide cards
      if (y === 'all') {
        cards.forEach(c => c.classList.remove('d-none'));
      } else {
        cards.forEach(c => c.classList.toggle('d-none', c.dataset.year !== y));
      }
    }, { passive: true });
  });
</script>
